attributes.action: stop the slander off working dogs and the people that work them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i for one am sick off people mouthing off about working dogs and the people that work them legaly
so i ask you prime minister that you look at this petition and see that a section off your engish people that are law abiding are being pushed into a dark area off this so called great country
